title: Best of Patreon: April 2022
description:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of April. Subscribe today and catch our Minisode update on the Sherri Papini case dropping this week!.
 
In this episode, you'll hear:
- True Crime Headlines on familial DNA
- Cancelable food takes
- Relationship Advice about a husband's too-close coworker
- Righteous trends from the 4/20 Live Q&A
- Advice for a budding livestreamer from the Live Listener AITA
 
If you like what you hear and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits to subscribe today! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
